content: What body organ has four chambers including the left ventricle and right atrium?

The body organ that has four chambers, including the left ventricle and right atrium, is the heart. The human heart is divided into four chambers: the left atrium, left ventricle, right atrium, and right ventricle. These chambers work together to pump blood throughout the body, with the left ventricle being responsible for pumping oxygenated blood to the body and the right atrium receiving deoxygenated blood from the body.
